Text: Thank you very much!! I didn't think it would be that quick. Great job keep up the good work.

Also, if they're smaller sizes, they're not the same quality.  But I'd love to check them out if they are in fact a high resolution squeezed into a 640x container.

/IGNORING the VIP Troll ...

So ... I've gotten several messages lately on multiple sites asking about season 2 of "The Clone Wars" now that the season is finished ...

The answers are ...

YES, I am aware it's over.

YES, I am still planning on uploading the whole season in 853x converts like I did for the 1st season.

YES, I am working on it.

YES, I am nearly done. I actually only have a couple more left to convert and tag, and they will ALL be separate episodes (no double-episode files).

WHEN: Probably when this torrent is completed, I'll upload them.
